title: LFP Silver to Gold
body: I'm a silver 5 adc main looking for partners of mmr a fair bit higher (though I know this is a bit selfish of me) to climb faster to gold. I was gold 4 in preseason but I was placed in silver 4, climbed to silver 3, massive tilt and hovered around silver 5 for a while. Now I've got it together and am managing to climb, but I want it to be faster. I can play almost all adcs, but I can consistently do well with Miss Fortune, Jinx and Kalista. My secondary is mid.

replies.body:
Hey mate. i finish on 2 accounts last season in gold. Im also a bot lane main, i find i play a strong adc but thats helped me become stronger as a support also. i enjoy the bot lane and am looking for a strong adc main to play with. 
Add me in game and hopefully we can make something work.

Aus Dave
